extendedInfo.description: âââ Introducing DioVoice All-in-One, a voice recognition translation App for travelers! âââAre you planning a trip abroad? Do you feel unsure of yourself when speaking a foreign language?Now with DioVoice All-in-One, you can communicate with people who use foreign language at anytime, anywhere.Itâs DioVoice All-in-One! Always with you!âDioVoice All-in-One is a translation App specialized for travelers and features voice recognition and TTS services in English, Korean and Japanese.** OS Version: Android 2.2 ~ 4.2** Special features of DioVoice All-in-One **â¶ Translator with Voice Recognition Features-It is easy and convenient.: Simply speak a sentence while pressing the MIC button and it will give you the translation.: You can also type a sentence using your keyboard, and it will give you the translation.(Korean<->English, Korean<->Japanese)â¶ Text to Speech service in each language-	The TTS service is available for translations in each language (English, Korean & Japanese)â¶ Available both online and offline-Can be used even without an Internet connection, so no roaming fees if overseas.â¶ Additional Features: Favorites and History-Favorites: You can add and manage the phrases you frequently use (up to 200).-	History: Your recent translations will show at the bottom of the screen (up to 50).â¶ Intuitive User Interface-The intuitive interface service allows easy access and use of the service.-A preferred UI language is available in the userâs desired language.(English, Korean, Japanese)=============================================[Basic Information]ï®OS Version: Android 2.2 ~ 4.2[DIOTEK Facebook]ï®www.facebook.com/DIOTEK=============================================
